paragraph.value: We find that word vectors and LMs pretrained on small similar sources can achieve competitive or even
than the ones pretrained on larger sources (Table 5). On JNLPBA, ScienceIE and Wetlab, LMs pretrained on the small similar source perform
, while word vectors pretrained on the small similar source perform

on CRAFT, JNLPBA, and ScienceIE.
